job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pClient located headquartered in Denver Colorado is seeking a 100 remote Data Scientist for a long term contract positionnbspThis position will participate on a small team thatnbspwill work with medical claims and policy related data that comes in a variety of formats  structured and unstructured  to generate insights and embed artificial intelligence into applicationsppbrppRequiredppPythonppStrong modeling skillsppKnowledge of BASHppSQL codingppbrppDesiredppData library experience spaCy Pandas NumPy Scikitlearn XGBoost Tensorflow PyTorch Keras etcppExperience working with insurance data medical records insurance claims policy datappAPI developmentppGoogle Cloud Platformp
